title: Experience-Based Learning Design for Understanding and Utilizing Self-Regulated Learning (SRL)

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on applying self-regulated learning theory to actual learning contexts for mathematics learners

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of self-regulated learning (SRL): planning, monitoring, and evaluation
Learners can reflectively analyze their learning experiences in light of experiential learning models and SRL theory
Learners can derive multidimensional understanding of SRL strategies by comparing peers' essays

resources: TV Documentary Clips (Middle School Learner Case Studies)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
